course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Understanding and Leading in the Sports Industry
course.description: The sports industry is interesting in many ways:  a few professional sports are given prominent coverage globally and this course focuses on below aspects whilst considering the key functions and issues related to the sports industry globally. (1)What makes the sports industry different? An overview of its functions, issues, governance and organizational cultures (2) Commercialized sports & finance (3) Sport events (4) Marketing and HR of sports (and future of the sports industry).
